pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ragged Grids for 'ggplot2' // Extend 'ggplot2' facets to panel layouts arranged in a grid with ragged edges. facet_ragged_rows() groups panels in rows of (potentially) varying lengths, facet_ragged_cols() does the same for columns. These can be useful, for example, to represent nested or partially crossed relationships between faceting variables.
